item.title: France Sends Former President Nicolas Sarkozy to Prison to Start 5-Year Sentence
item.description: Nicolas Sarkozy, the president of France from 2007 to 2012, reported to a prison in Paris weeks after his conviction in a corruption trial.

item.title: Gaza Humanitarian Foundation Operations Unravel

item.title: Japan Shifts Further Right With Its First Female Prime Minister
item.description: Japanese lawmakers elected the country’s first female prime minister, Sanae Takaichi, a hard-line conservative. Javier C. Hernández, our Tokyo bureau ...

item.title: Louvre Robbery Raises Questions About Security
item.description: Investigators were looking into the alarm systems at an institution that one expert said “wasn’t built with an obsession over security.”
